attributes.action: Create a maxium wage and increase the minimum wage in order to reduce the rich/poor wealth divide and bring more finacial equality to the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should increase the minimun wage and create a maximum wage of something like £150,000 a year plus bonus's. This would prevent people earning obscene amounts of money e.g. £100,000 a week and would help bring people out of poverty. We should stop this cycle of the rich getting richer and the poor getting poorer, this would happen if we increase wages for the poor and capped them for the rich.
